name: Box Shooter (Geek Z)
description:
Lower your mouse sensibility for best experience.

Move with WASD, aim with the mouse, and shoot with left click. Shoot all the green boxes before time runs out. Hit the bright boxes for extra time. Avoid hitting the yellow boxes.

This game was made following the course Game Design and Development from Michigan State University, taught by professor Brian Winn, in the online class platform Coursera. (Link here: https://www.coursera.org/specializations/game-development )

All assets and scripts were provided to me. I take credit in the design of the second and third level, as well as the texture of the bullets.
